name: root-redux-rewire
description: State management library for react based applications

scripts.test: yarn workspaces foreach -Ap --exclude ssr-app --exclude example-todo-app --exclude vanila-app run test
scripts.test-ci: yarn workspaces foreach -Ap --exclude ssr-app --exclude example-todo-app  --exclude vanila-app run test-ci
scripts.lint: yarn workspaces foreach -Ap --exclude ssr-app --exclude example-todo-app  --exclude vanila-app run lint
scripts.lint-fix: yarn workspaces foreach -Ap --exclude ssr-app --exclude example-todo-app  --exclude vanila-app run lint-fix
scripts.prettier-check: yarn workspaces foreach -Ap --exclude ssr-app --exclude example-todo-app  --exclude vanila-app run prettier-check
scripts.prettier-fix: yarn workspaces foreach -Ap --exclude ssr-app --exclude example-todo-app  --exclude vanila-app run prettier-fix
scripts.postinstall: yarn workspace @ds-fancode/redux-rewire-core build && yarn workspace @ds-fancode/redux-rewire-react build && yarn workspace @ds-fancode/redux-rewire build
scripts.clean-repo: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'build' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' +

author: FanCode
